headline: WK Kellogg Stock Soars on Report of Possible Ferrero Buyout
summary: The Wall Street Journal reported that the Italian chocolate maker could acquire the owner of Frosted Flakes and Froot Loops for around $3 billion.

raw.headline: WK Kellogg Stock Soars on Report of Possible Ferrero Buyout

headline: Frosted Flakes Maker WK Kellogg’s Stock Soars on Report of Deal Talks With Ferrero
summary: Shares of Frosted Flakes maker WK Kellogg surged nearly 50% in extended trading Wednesday following a report the company could soon be acquired by Italian sweets seller Ferrero.

raw.headline: Frosted Flakes Maker WK Kellogg’s Stock Soars on Report of Deal Talks With Ferrero

headline: Italy's Ferrero nears deal to buy Froot Loops maker WK Kellogg, source says
summary: The Italian candy maker behind Ferrero Rocher and Nutella is nearing a deal to buy cereal maker WK Kellogg, a source told Reuters, an acquisition that would combine two of the world's best known...

headline: Ferrero nears about $3 billion deal for WK Kellogg, WSJ reports
summary: The Italian candy maker behind Ferrero Rocher is nearing an about $3 billion deal to buy WK Kellogg, the Wall Street Journal reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter. ...

headline: Merger-Arbitrage Investors With Billions to Wager Await Next Wave of Mega-Deals
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Merger arbitrage investors are finally enjoying gains again after their trading strategy resulted in some first-half windfalls. Now, with fresh billions to wager, all they need is a new wave of dealmaking.
